name: Money Catcher (Synwickes)
description:
Hi guys ! This is my first game released to itch.io , I wish you'll like it !! Game Introduction :

Money Catcher is a 2D casual game . In this game , you are going to move a virtual hand left and right to catch money and avoid bad things falling from top of screen . There are two game modes in this game , stage mode and challenge mode . In stage mode ,  there is a time limit so you shoud catch enough money before stage is over . In challenge mode there is no time limit but if police car or ambulance run into you , then you will lose all of money and restart challenge , and your best score will be recorded .

Game Guide :

You can use either keyboard or mouse to play this game .You can choose one of those operation method below which you like best .

          Move Left                        Move Right

                  A                                      D

                 ←                                      →

 Mouse Left Button        Mouse Right Button

Mouse Move Left              Mouse Move Right

Game Engine :

Unity

Version : 

1.1

Update:

fixed a program issue which caused highst record in challenge mode don't show right result .
